SELECT TICKET_ID, PRIORITY_YN, COMPANY_NAME, STATUS_CD, REQUEST_TYPE_CD, SUPPORT_CD, IFNULL(MD, '') AS MD, TITLE, T.CREATE_NAME, U.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(T.CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DT, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(T.COMPLETE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '') AS COMPLETE_DT, SATISFACTION FROM T_TICKET_INFO AS T LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO AS U ON T.MANAGER_ID = U.USER_ID
DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND STATUS_CD != 'CLOSED'
AND STATUS_CD = 'CLOSED'
AND T.COMPANY_ID = #{searchCompany}
AND U.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND T.CREATE_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{startDt}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND T.COMPLETE_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDt}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND T.COMPLETE_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDt}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND T.CREATE_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDt}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY TICKET_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TICKET_INFO (COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, STATUS_CD, REQUEST_TYPE_CD, EXPECTED_COMPLETE_DT, COMPLETE_DT, PRIORITY_YN, TITLE, CONTENT, MANAGER_ID, CREATE_ID,CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DT, FILE_ID, PARENT_TICKET_CD, SUPPORT_CD, MD) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{companyName}, #{statusCd}, #{requestTypeCd}, #{expectedCompleteDt}, #{completeDt}, #{priorityYn}, #{title}, #{content}, #{managerId}, #{createId}, #{createName}, NOW(), #{updateId}, sysdate(), #{fileId}, #{parentTicketCd}, #{supportCd}, #{md});
mapper.update: UPDATE T_TICKET_INFO SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd}, REQUEST_TYPE_CD = #{requestTypeCd}, SUPPORT_CD = #{supportCd}, PRIORITY_YN = #{priorityYn}, MANAGER_ID = #{managerId}, EXPECTED_COMPLETE_DT = #{expectedCompleteDt}, COMPLETE_DT = #{completeDt}, MD = #{md}, PARENT_TICKET_CD = #{parentTicketCd}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE TICKET_ID = #{ticketId};
mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID as MANAGER_ID, U.USER_NAME as MANAGER_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO as U LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_INFO as C on C.MANAGER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE C.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}

SELECT TICKET_ID, T.CREATE_ID, CREATE_NAME, PRIORITY_YN, COMPANY_NAME, T.COMPANY_ID as COMPANY_ID, STATUS_CD, REQUEST_TYPE_CD, SUPPORT_CD, IFNULL(MD, '') as MD, TITLE, CONTENT, T.MANAGER_ID as MANAGER_ID, U.USER_NAME as MANAGER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(T.CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as CREATE_DT, DATE_FORMAT(T.EXPECTED_COMPLETE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') as EXPECTED_COMPLETE_DT, DATE_FORMAT(COMPLETE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS COMPLETE_DT FROM T_TICKET_INFO as T LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO as U on T.MANAGER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE TICKET_ID = #{ticketId} and DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT ANSWER_ID, TICKET_ID, STATUS_CD, CONTENT, T.CREATE_ID, U.USER_NAME as CREATE_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(T.CREATE_DT, '%y/%m/%d %H:%i') as CREATE_DT , FILE_ID, USER_CLASS FROM T_TICKET_ANSWER as T LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO as U on T.CREATE_ID = U.USER_ID where TICKET_ID = #{ticketId} and DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT USER_ID as MANAGER_ID, USER_NAME as MANAGER_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO as U WHERE (USER_CLASS = 'ADMIN' OR USER_CLASS ='SYSADMIN') AND USE_YN = 'Y' order by USER_NAME
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FILE F JOIN T_TICKET_ANSWER A ON F.FILE_ID = CONCAT('C', A.ANSWER_ID) SET F.DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.TICKET_ID = #{ticketId}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN CREATE_ID != #{commentId} THEN CREATE_ID WHEN MANAGER_ID != #{commentId} THEN MANAGER_ID END AS REMAINING_VALUE FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE TICKET_ID = #{ticketId}
